page.title: 08A typical school day
page.content: The school day starts at about 8.00am. Breakfasting on toast & orange,I Quickly get dressed for school.8.45am. arrives,& I dash for my friend Stephanie.We set off at a brisk pace merrily chattering away.When the whistle goes for a second time,we line up in classes ready to enter. After organising my desk top in preparation for the rest of the day,we have register,followed by morning assembly.We usually do some sort of written work or science first thing in the morning,then some maths. 10.35am. playtime at last!The noise deafens as children run,& chase each other.While Stephanie & I play skipping.12.00am. approaches with our tummies rumbling, ready for lunch.Quite often we do art in the afternoon & at 2.30pm. we have another playtime.3.45pm. means release from school at last!
